message: That buttery coating is perfect—rich, smooth, and comforting.
The garlic flavor is just right—fragrant and well balanced.
Perfect! You took a different route but all is well!
A different road, but the same destination. Bravo!
Too much oil made the dish feel heavy instead of light and juicy.
The lemon-lime soda is overpowering and masked the shrimp’s natural sweetness.
The butter is overwhelming and made the dish excessively greasy.
Way too much lemon soda—its sharpness took over the entire dish.
